tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE course_materials (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  course_id INT,
  access_type ENUM('online', 'offline'),
  material_link TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lecture_slides (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    course_id INT,
    slide_data BLOB,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE readings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    course_id INT,
    reading_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE course_materials (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(255),
  lecture_slides TEXT,
  readings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE online_learners (
  learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  course_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_materials(course_id)
)

CREATE TABLE offline_learners (
  learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  course_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_materials(course_id)
)

CREATE TABLE lectures (lecture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_id INT,
  lecture_name VARCHAR(255),
  lecture_date DATE,
  lecture_duration INT);

CREATE TABLE readings (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_id INT,
  reading_title VARCHAR(255),
  reading_content TEXT,
  reading_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_name VARCHAR(255),
  user_type ENUM('online', 'offline'),
  user_email VARCHAR(255),
  user_phone VARCHAR(20));

CREATE TABLE course_materials (material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_id INT,
  material_type ENUM('lecture', 'reading'),
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  material_url VARCHAR(255));
